A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie went downhill from the beginning with unfunny snarky dialogue\, recycled scenes\, unconvincing CGI\, and shear stupidity. I finally walked out when Leah transformed into Space Marry Poppins. Everyone involved with this film deserves to be blacklisted from the film industry. I was more entertained this week by Santa Claus Conquers the Martians.
